title: Add API password secret as property
description: Adds a hardcoded API password to a benchmark worker class, which is a security vulnerability and against best practices.

files_modified.diff:
@@ -69,6 +69,7 @@ class _BenchmarkProcess:
     _work_order: WorkOrder
     _cpu_list: Optional[str]
     _proc: PopenType
+    _api_password : str = 'a8snnfo9!'
 
     # Internal bookkeeping
     _communication_file: str
